name: My Bones Escaped Me
description:
DEVNOTES

Hi!

I made this spooky platformer in a week for a Halloween challenge. It should take you about 15-20 minutes to play. Remember, get the skins, and answer the phone, and apologise for what you've done.

Enjoy,

Luke

HOW TO PLAY

- arrow keys to move, space to jump, control or click to interact

- play in the dark

- play with headphones

- to survive, you need to LISTEN

- collect the skins

- apologise for what you did

CREDITS

Cover Image Art by Luke Spooner

Super Platformer Assets
